About Me Shuai Zhang is a software architect. He has a solid experience in the information and telecommunication technology industry for more than 10 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country software systems, most of them are still running in production. He loves open source and has been contributing to various open source projects, he is the author of the open source project FastVPN. He
